Package gov.tak.api.widgets

Interface ILinearLayoutWidget

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ILayoutWidget, IMapWidget, IParentWidget, IPropertyBindingObject<IMapWidget>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LinearLayoutWidget, LinearLayoutWidget, RelockWidget, ScrollLayoutWidget, ScrollLayoutWidget
    public interface ILinearLayoutWidget
extends ILayoutWidget
    Parent widget with functions similar to a LinearLayout view

      • getOrCreateLayout

        ILinearLayoutWidget getOrCreateLayout​(java.lang.String path)
        Get or create a new layout widget in this hierarchy
        Parameters:
        path - Layout names separated by slashes where the last letter specifies the orientation (V or H) i.e. WidgetLayoutV/WidgetLayoutH = horizontal within vertical
        Returns:
        Existing or newly created layout widget
